title: Interpretation of a dream about Roman statues in a dream

preview.html: Seeing Roman statues in a dream is very disturbing, as it causes many people to feel fear and extreme panic, due to their strange shapes, unclear features, and white colors, as most of them resemble ghosts. Through today's article in the encyclopedia to interpret seeing it in a dream in different situations that one can see, follow us. Roman statues in a dream The great scholar Ibn Sirin believes that seeing Roman statues falls under the category of seeing statues in general, and perhaps seeing statues is not good at all, as it is a sign of hypocrisy and hypocrisy on the part of the visionary. Seeing it can be a sign of a state of stability and stability in the dreamer's life. Sometimes it is a sign of the birth of a righteous offspring. However, seeing it is most likely a sign of the dreamer breaking many of the relationships that connected him with his other loved ones, and he needs to repair these relationships in order to get rid of the feeling of despair and loss of hope that controls him. Interpretation of talking about Roman statues in a dream This dream is one of the things that frightens a person a lot, because he is afraid of the appearance of these white talking statues. This dream indicates the presence of many hypocrites and hypocrites in the fortune teller's life, who appear different from what they hide, and despite the beauty of their appearance and appearance, they only convey to the fortune teller deception and cunning. If the dreamer sees in his dream that he is befriending a Roman statue or He accompanies him and treats him like a normal person, this is a sign that he befriends people who do not bring him any benefit and are bad friends who will try to attract him. The path of evil and sin, and must be very careful. Interpretation of seeing a Roman statue in the form of a woman If you see a woman in this form, this is a sign that there is a woman who is characterized by cunning and deceit and is trying to catch the fortune teller. This may be a sign of a woman who has no benefit or benefit. Interpretation of worshiping the Roman statue It is known that worshipping idols and statues is one of the pre-Islamic customs that the Islamic religion was able to eliminate, and despite the religiosity of the Messenger or his commitment to performing worship, obedience and religious matters, you may be exposed to this vision. It may indicate that the dreamer is doing many things that do not benefit him in any good or benefit, as well as the need to stay away from the mistake he is doing in his life, and to adhere more to the matters of his religion. Interpretation of a treasure of Roman statues It is considered one of the happy dreams, foretelling its owner that he will travel on a trip soon to a European country and reap many benefits from that trip. Interpretation of a dream about Roman statues according to the material from which they were made If the dreamer finds in his dream that the statue is made of stone, this is evidence that the dreamer is in a relationship with a cruel and cruel person who harms people more than he benefits them, and he must stay away. From him before he gets injured. The silver statue shows the desire to marry a foreign girl or the fortune teller’s continuous attempts to establish illicit relationships with girls of foreign nationalities, and these are forbidden things, and the vision in this case is a warning sign of the need to avoid this matter completely. In the event

title: Interpretation of a dream about perfume in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about perfume in a dream according to Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi, there are many dreams that we see in a dream, and each of these dreams has interpretations and connotations related to it, and among these dreams is the dream of perfume in a dream, and because it is considered one of the common dreams that raised many questions related to it on all social networking sites, And because it contains many different interpretations and connotations that we will learn about in our article for today, which bears the title “Dream Interpretation of Perfumes in a Dream” by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi. Explanation of the interpretation of a dream about perfume in a dream by the translator Ibn Sirin. There are many questions that have caused a great uproar on various social networking sites recently. The last, and these questions have attracted the attention of many pioneers of research sites and famous social networking sites, and one of the most important of these questions is related to interpretations of dreams, including the interpretation of a dream about perfumes in a dream, and in this paragraph, we have presented to you, my dear brothers and sisters, our comprehensive and interpretive paragraph that we will talk about. In it, about the interpretation of a dream about perfume in a dream, it is a simple method and is given to you that is easy to benefit from and share. The interpretation of a dream about perfume in a dream is interpreted as follows: When one sees perfume in his dream, it means that this person will live a happy life. When one sees perfume in his dream, it means That he will achieve many successful and important goals in his life on a practical level. When one sees perfume in his pocket in his dream, it means that he will obtain many good and appropriate benefits that one will benefit from in the future. When one sees in his dream that he is spraying a lot of perfume on His clothes, it means that he will get rid of problems and diseases that are among the difficulties in his life. When one sees perfume in his dream, it means that he will have a lot of money in the near future, God willing. When one sees in his dream that he is spraying perfume, it means In the near future he will do many charitable works and good things in his life, God willing. Seeing perfume in a dream is a sign of different meanings, interpretations and connotations. , whether good or bad, as it is represented according to the psychological and social state that the dreamer is going through. The interpretation of a dream about perfume in one dream of Al-Nabulsi is as follows: The famous translator Al-Nabulsi says that the person who sees perfume in his dream indicates the great and tremendous success that this person will achieve in the future. The famous translator Al-Nabulsi says that whoever sees that he perfumes his clothes, this indicates that this person is coughing. He constantly and constantly searches for the most important things that will benefit him and keep him away from harm. The famous commentator Al-Nabulsi says that whoever sees perfume is the great development in his life and the noticeable change that it will bring about from the worst to the best. title: Interpretation of seeing a bisht in a dream and a dream of a man wearing a black bisht for a single woman

preview.html: Among the good visions is seeing a bisht, and this also indicates strength and authority, and whoever sees that he is wearing a bisht, then this indicates that this person will attain sovereignty, and in general, when he sees a bisht, it indicates the good complexion of the dreamer and that his status will rise and his circumstances will change for the better, God willing. There are many interpretations of seeing a besht in a dream. We will provide some interpretations for it, which differ depending on the vision, and therefore we will point out some visions in which a besht is present. Interpretation of seeing a besht in a dream in all its colors. As we mentioned previously, the interpretation of seeing an epidemic in a dream is a good vision. But the interpretation varies depending on the details of the dream, and the colors of the plague can also affect the interpretation of the vision, and this is what we will point out: Before starting the interpretation, it is necessary to know the meaning of the word bisht, as the word bisht in the Arabic language means a cloak, and now we will explain. Look, bisht. We drive. :The lead besht indicates that the fortuneteller is honest and that his heart is characterized by purity, as he does not hate anyone. Also, the lead besht can indicate the scope of livelihood. It can also indicate in the vision that the owner of the vision is thinking right and working to achieve himself and all his ambitions. Seeing a black or brown bisht in a dream can indicate a broad diet and a distinguished status as well. The meaning of a black or brown bisht is that this person respects God Almighty in all his affairs, so no one knows what to use to disgrace him with it. A white bisht in a dream indicates that this person who He sees the practice of worship, which brings him closer to God Almighty. But if the besht appears in any color in the dream and it is cut or dirty, this does not bode well and is an unpleasant vision. Interpretation of seeing a besht for a pregnant woman. Interpretations of seeing a besht for a pregnant woman in a dream vary according to the dream, its details and color, and according to the scholar Who interpreted the dream? Here are the most important interpretations: If a pregnant woman buys a man’s bisht in a dream, this means that she is bearing responsibility and pain. But if the dream is about sewing a bisht for a pregnant woman, this indicates that she is pregnant with a male child. If a pregnant woman sees that her husband is pulling the bisht, then she may This indicates the loss of the fetus. If a pregnant woman sees a black bisht, this indicates the status that the newborn will have. If a pregnant woman sees that her dead father is wearing a black bust, this indicates that the pregnant woman with the vision will inherit. Interpretation of a dream about a man wearing a black dress wearing a bisht Black denotes pride and dignity. Seeing a black bisht in a dream with golden embroidery indicates wealth. Seeing a man wearing a black but transparent bisht means that the dreamer’s secrets will be revealed in front of his family. But if the man wears a black bisht, but it is patched, this indicates unhappiness. If the bisht is Black is smooth, it means that this person is characterized by compassion. Wearing a dirty black bisht indicates a bad reputation. You may also be interested in the following: Interpretation of a dream about wearing an abaya for a divorced woman. I saw my ex-wife wearing a bra. Seeing a bisht in this state indicates his desire to return it to her again If she sees her ex-husband taking out the bisht, this indicates his lack of respect

title: What is the interpretation of seeing Queen Elizabeth complete in a dream?

preview.html: The Trend website provides you with a complete interpretation of seeing Queen Elizabeth in a dream, but seeing Queen Elizabeth in a dream is full of dreams that surprise her when she sees her, and this vision may be from a vision that is not for many. A person in a complete dream is a strange and unrealistic dream that causes anxiety and psychological discomfort for many, and many interpreters cannot interpret this vision, but here we will explain this vision to you. Pregnant women and men. The interpretation of seeing Queen Elizabeth in a dream was completed by Imam Al-Sadiq. Imam Al-Sadiq says that Queen Elizabeth in a dream shows the dreamer’s mature mind, and God knows best. Seeing Queen Elizabeth in a complete dream indicates personal strength, self-confidence, and walking in a high position. If a married woman sees this The vision indicates the mother’s happiness with the success of her children and their bright future in the future. The interpretation of seeing Queen Elizabeth complete in a dream may indicate the coming of goodness and the opening of the door of sustenance, because the dreamer does not count. Rather, seeing the dead queen in a dream complete indicates the arrival of goodness and the achievement of many goals. And the dreams that one hopes to achieve. The complete interpretation of seeing Queen Elizabeth in a dream for a general woman. Seeing the Queen in a girl’s general dream can indicate a close marriage with the person she wants to marry. It also indicates excellence and success in her academic and professional life and indicates her personal strength. Also, seeing The death of the Queen in a dream completely means achieving goals and dreams and joining new jobs. And if he sees her completely sitting with the Queen in the dream, this indicates food, blessings, and many good things, and God knows best. Seeing Queen Elizabeth in a dream full of married women. If a married woman dreams that she meets the Queen, this means It indicates the collapse of all disputes and sorrows between her and her husband. Also, seeing Queen Elizabeth in a dream of a married girl means the happiness that she will see and a high status. Indeed, seeing the death of the Queen in a dream filled with a married woman indicates that she will soon become pregnant and give birth to a child with a beautiful face and a good soul. If she sees If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is holding the queen’s hand and begging her, this indicates an easy period for her pregnancy. Also, seeing the queen Elizabeth in her dream indicates the high status of her husband and a lot of livelihood that he will soon see in his life. But if she sees that she is sitting next to the queen, this indicates the high status of her child and that she will take her child from her. The interpretation of seeing Queen Elizabeth in a dream is complete for a man. If a man sees the queen in his dream, This indicates an increase in his close marriage to the girl he loves. Likewise, if he sees the queen’s death in a dream complete, this means sustenance, a lot of money, participation in a new job and hard work. But if a married man sees that he is talking to the queen, this indicates The best conditions, high status, and focus. Also, visions

title: The meaning of seeing a box in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of seeing a box in a dream, and seeing a box in a dream, and marrying a young man in a dream, is evidence of a journey or journey. In other words, seeing a poor box means wealth. Boxes are containers of different shapes and sizes, usually used to store or transport various items and goods. You can put tools in them or use them to store food, and there are many other uses. Products are placed in the box for display. The meaning of seeing a box in a dream and seeing a heavy box in a dream means anxiety and sadness. Interpretation of seeing a chest by Ibn Sirin A closed box in a dream represents a man. The carton is empty, indicating a lack of financial resources. Seeing boxes filled with goods is evidence that you will earn money from trade and that the fortuneteller will succeed in his work. Meaning of seeing a box in a dream: Seeing a box full of mattresses indicates the dreamer’s desire to get married and his desire to find a life partner Appropriate.Interpretation of seeing the box for individualsIf a girl sees that she has breasts in her dream, she will marry a prestigious person. If she dreams of getting gold or silver from her chest, she will marry a businessman. If she is found carrying a heavy bag, this means that she has married a man in debt and he will worry her. If a girl sees a box with a ring, this indicates her engagement. When he sees a shoe box inside, he is ready for marriage. Interpretation of seeing the box for a married woman. Square breasts in a married woman’s dream indicate a stable and sustainable life. The box shows success and luck. The meaning of seeing breasts in a dream, seeing Heavy breasts in a dream mean anxiety and sadness. A golden frame in a married woman’s dream indicates pregnancy in the near future. Seeing a wooden box is a symbol of travel and money. Seeing an iron box is evidence of her husband’s cruelty. Interpretation of the view of breasts for a pregnant woman. A square box in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates the birth of a boy. This box shows the health condition of the fetus in a pregnant woman’s dream. Interpretation of a vision on a man’s chest. The box The gold that a man dreams of is bad news. If one sees a box full of gold in a dream, it means exhaustion and difficulty in life. Seeing a closed wooden box proves that he has spent a lot of money without accounting. A wooden box in a married woman’s dream. Seeing breasts in a married woman’s dream indicates Good and abundant nutrition. It indicates children, money, wealth and prosperity. It can also indicate a husband’s journey. Meaning of seeing a box in a dream. An empty box in a dream is undesirable and indicates poverty and running out of money. An empty box also indicates a lack of children. title: Interpretation of seeing an airplane in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: I like itFansSubscribersFansInterpretation of seeing an airplane in a dream Ibn Sirin’s airplane is one of the means of public transportation that transports people from one country to another, and it is one of the most famous means of transportation that was discovered a long time ago.Interpretation of seeing an airplane by Ibn Sirin: Dreaming of traveling by airplane indicates the speed of responding to a request.Seeing an airplane in The sky means that this person will get a high position in his work. Inside an airplane dreamIt indicates the wealth and wealth that the dreamer will be in. Seeing an airplane in a dream indicates the achievement of all goals. A sick person who dreams that he is boarding an airplane will die. Sometimes riding an airplane is a sign of piety and uprightness. In life. Whoever dreams that he is throwing stones at an airplane is throwing some nobodies. Interpretation of a dream about an airplane by Al-Nabulsi in a dream. Owning an airplane in a dream indicates commitment and responsibility. Whoever sees that he is flying without facing any problem, it will be easy. Whoever sees a sick bird flying in the air will die. Because of this disease. Seeing a plane landing in a dream means that the dreamer will undergo surgery. If one sees that he is flying in a plane, this indicates the person’s self-confidence. Whoever sees many planes in a dream, corruption will spread in the city in which he is. title: Interpretation of a dream saying “O God, bless our master Muhammad” by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream saying “O God, bless our master Muhammad” by Ibn Sirin. From our noble Messenger to the owner of the vision. Today, in our article, we will learn about the encyclopedia about its interpretation (God’s saying upon our master Muhammad) and what is the interpretation of scholars such as Ibn Sirin for this vision. Interpretation of a dream saying “O God, bless our master Muhammad” by Ibn Sirin: The scholar Ibn Sirin said, and he One of the leading dream interpretation scholars said that when he saw the dream, he said: O God, bless and grant peace to our master Muhammad. There are many interpretations, including: Interpretation of what our Master Muhammad, peace and blessings of God be upon him, said to a debtor: Whoever sees in his dream that he is saying: O God, bless our Master Muhammad, and he is suffering from a lack of money or the debtor has created many problems for him, then this dream indicates that he is paying his debt and that God Blessed and righteous. God Almighty expands his food, and God knows best. And whoever sees in his dream that he is saying, O God, bless and grant peace upon our master Muhammad, and wants to do a life’s work or perform Hajj, then this dream indicates that God, Blessed and Most High, honors him. His actions. And God knows best. Whoever sees in his dream that he is praying over the Messenger and has suffered great injustice and trouble in his life, then this dream indicates that God, Blessed and Most High, will remove injustice from him and relieve him of his distress, and God knows best. Interpretation of his saying, may God’s prayers and peace be upon him, our Lord Muhammad, to the sick: And whoever sees In his dream, he was praying to our Noble Messenger, and the dreamer was suffering from an illness, so this dream indicates that God, Blessed and Almighty, will prescribe a cure for him in the near future, and God knows best. Interpretation of the name Muhammad in a dream: Dream interpretation scholars said that when they see the name Muhammad in a dream This is very good news and that God, Blessed and Almighty, will grant him abundant money and success in his work and family. Zoe. Interpretation of the words of God and prayers and peace be upon our Master Muhammad for the pregnant woman: Whoever sees in her dream that she is praying to our Noble Messenger, saying that the dream is good news and that God, Blessed and Almighty, will give birth to her easily and the child will be very Beauty and good health. And God knows best. Interpretation of the phrase “O God, bless our master Muhammad” in a dream for a married woman: Whoever sees in her dream that she is saying: O God, bless our master Muhammad. She blessed her house a lot, and provided her husband with wealth and abundance, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of the words of God and prayers and peace be upon our Master Muhammad on the unmarried woman: Praying for our noble Prophet in a dream for an unmarried girl indicates her closeness to God Almighty and that she follows the Sunnah of our Noble Messenger and she is a girl of good morals and religion. She announces her success in her academic and professional life, and that God Almighty will bless her in the near future with a good husband for her, and God knows best. To interpret a different dream, you can use the Live Dream Interpretation application.

title: Learn about the interpretation of a cat in a dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: A cat in a dream: Sometimes a person sees a cat in his sleep and feels happy if he is one of those people who prefer to deal with cats or take care of them, but most of the indicators that came from dream scientists about seeing a cat were disturbing and related to it. Some problems for the sleeper. If you are looking for an interpretation of a cat in a dream, follow us on the dream interpretation website to know its meaning. Cat in a dream. Legal experts expect that seeing a cat in a dream is confirmation of some negative feelings and a feeling of sadness and lack of appreciation from the viewer, because it needs attention and care, because the cat in The dream expresses distress from unpleasant circumstances and conflicts. With those around you from the dream. Most experts believe that the appearance of a cat in the vision is an undesirable sign of theft, and therefore if it is inside your home, you must protect it strongly in the coming period, as you may lose part of the property inside due to thieves. The cat in Ibn Sirin’s dreamThe cat In a dream, according to Ibn Sirin, it symbolizes the presence of many troubles around the person and bad working conditions as a result of his unsuccessful moment at that time, and the meaning of the unpleasant dream increases if the cat tries to bite you because of the interpretation. It indicates your biography, which some people talk about negatively, and this is a lie and slander against you. Ibn Sirin explains that a black cat in a dream is one of the most harmful signs if we want to interpret it, because it is a sign of what someone is doing around the sleeper, stabbing him, polluting his life, or lying to him. Therefore, killing him in the vision is good for a person to feel comfortable after having a lot of suffering in the past. To reach the most accurate interpretation of your dream, Google’s online dream interpretation, which includes thousands of interpretations by leading interpretation scholars. A cat in a dream for single people. Scientists confirm that a girl’s vision of a cat in Her dream most likely relates to the loss of some happy opportunities, as well as the arrival of unpleasant news with the appearance of unwanted obstacles during her work, as well as her studies if they are. At an early age, this can happen with the presence of a black cat in her dream. While there are types of cats for single people, which is a sign of kindness and marriage to them, the white cat, especially the small ones, and if he sees small and colorful cats, it indicates happiness and turns life from pressure to luxury, while A cat bites a girl in a dream represents that falling into a major struggle in which she may fail and not be able to get it right and is actually exposed to serious injustice in this regard. A cat in a dream for a married woman. When a lady sees a wild cat in her house, we must warn her of various things that may It is in one of them, such as the betrayal of her husband by a friend or family member, which means that there is a bad event happening soon that he does not want at all. As for seeing a white cat in a dream, it is interpreted that she will get some money, and this is despite the fact that he does not want it at all. It bites or attacks it, meaning it is tamed, and the presence of small, cute cats in the house is a sign of joy and the arrival of honorable occasions for its family, God willing. A cat in a dream does not

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing milk or milk in a dream in detail by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of seeing milk or milk in a dream in detail according to Ibn Sirin. Milk has excellent tasks that it provides to the body, which makes it difficult to give this drink at all, as it makes the calcium element available to the body and also compensates for any deficiency that this body may satisfy. Milk in a dream in detail by Ibn Sirin, as he is the most famous interpreter of dreams. Seeing milk in a dream for a single woman. Interpretations of seeing milk or milk in a dream vary, because milk generally has good connotations for the dreamer. Also, seeing milk is a sign of reaching a high status, and here are the most important interpretations related to the following: Seeing milk in a dream for a single woman: Seeing milk in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates wealth and abundant money that this dreamer will obtain. Also, seeing cow’s milk in a dream It indicates wealth and wealth. Also, seeing milk in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates marriage to a person who has morals and justice. Ibn Sirin also interpreted seeing milk in an unmarried woman’s dream as money, kindness, and a blessing in her life. While Ibn Sirin also explained that seeing milk For unmarried women in a dream, it indicates the nearness of marriage. Also, if an unmarried woman sees herself milking a camel, this indicates her marriage to a well-off person. See also: Interpretation of dreams to see a new or old door in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about milk for a married woman. Among dream interpreters, There are many indications of seeing milk in a dream, as these interpretations vary depending on the personal situation of the pioneer. The most important thing I mentioned is the interpretation of a dream about milk for a married woman: A married woman who sees milk in her dream indicates food and money. Likewise, if a married woman sees in her dream that she is drinking milk, this indicates that she will become pregnant soon, God willing. Also, seeing a married woman watering others in a dream shows her love. For the good and the good that will return to her in her life. Likewise, buying milk in a dream for a married woman in large quantities indicates an inheritance or a successful project that will bring her halal money. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing maftool or couscous in a dream and its effects. Seeing milk in a dream for a divorced womanAmong the interpreters For those who dream, milk in a dream generally means obtaining abundant goods, gaining opportunities at work, or achieving the dreamer’s aspirations. Seeing milk in a dream for a divorced woman: If a divorced woman sees that she is boiling milk in her dream, this indicates her relationship with someone. Also, if she dreams that she is offering milk to someone, this indicates her close marriage to this person. While seeing a divorced woman in a dream with milk indicates kindness and the abundance of the color blue. See also: The complete interpretation of the dream of seeing the jinn in a dream by the most famous interpreters. Interpretation of the dream of seeing milk Different types of milk come out of the breast. The dreamer may see that he is drinking goat’s milk, cow’s milk, or other milk, but there are many dreams of seeing milk coming out of a woman’s breast, and here are the most important things that were mentioned, the interpretation of a vision’s dream

title: Loosening teeth in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Therefore, in this article we will discuss the interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s vision of loose teeth in a dream. The interpretation of seeing loose teeth in a dream for a single girl. Seeing teeth in a girl’s dream in general. It is one of the dreams that indicates how strong this girl is in her self-confidence. It also indicates that this girl She is very proud of herself and her outlook and appearance in front of everyone and always wants to appear splendid. As for an unmarried girl’s dream in a dream about losing teeth. It is one of the dreams that indicate the irregular social situation in which this girl lives. And that she will be greatly affected by the general turmoil that appears in her life and all her affairs. Confused. About a girl seeing while she was sleeping that her teeth were loose and then falling out completely. Evidence that this girl suffered from some difficult situations that she went through in her life, which made her feel extremely hopeless in her life and she saw that she was unable to deal with things. Seeing the front teeth loose and then They fall out in one girl’s dream. It is a dream that indicates that this girl will lose something dear to her. Mostly it will be something that she owns and keeps for a long time. See also: Interpretation of a dream about cleaning teeth for a single woman. Interpretation of seeing loose teeth in a dream for a married woman. When a married woman sees in her dream that Her teeth decay easily and fall out in her hand. This vision is evidence that this woman will obtain a huge sum of money through profit from a commercial project. Then her standard of living will rise completely and all circumstances will change. As for seeing teeth falling out and falling on a married woman’s clothes during her sleep. This vision is a sign that this woman will hear the news of great happiness in the coming period. Most likely, this news will be that this woman will be pregnant, which will make the whole house happy. About seeing the sensation of loose teeth in a married woman’s dream in general. It is Dreams that indicate that this woman is going through a very difficult psychological period as a result of her going through more than one problem and more than one hardship, one after another in a very short period of time. Seeing a married woman while she is sleeping with loose teeth in her mouth. A sign that this woman will lose someone very dear to her, Which is often the closest to her, and they will separate due to some inappropriate things and trivial events. Interpretation of seeing loose teeth in a dream for a divorced womanWhen a divorced woman dreams that her teeth are generally loose in a dream. This vision indicates that this woman is going through a difficult period in her life, and she She is going through a very difficult time. She is unable to organize her life and is looking for someone to stand by her in difficult times. Seeing a divorced woman having her lower teeth loose and falling to the ground in a dream. This vision is a sign that this woman will completely change her life and will likely move to a new city. She travels to a place far away from the people she knows completely. As for the divorced woman who sees that her teeth are shaved in a dream and she cannot remove them, this vision is evidence that this woman is strong in nature and that her separation from her husband
